website_summaries.verdict: Whether you have one cat or an entire family of fur babies, this litter scoop is designed to make the necessary task a bit easier. Aluminum design is built to last.
pros: Durable cast aluminum construction with an ergonomic handle
Coated in Teflon to prevent most waste from sticking to the sifter
Scoop slats do a good job trapping most particles of waste
Comes with a wall holder for storage
cons: Some types of litter will stick to it, despite the nonstick coating
Somewhat heavy, but this isn't a deal-breaker for most

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment for a human owned by cats.
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. I have 3 metal scoops this is the only one that's coated, this one always has stuff I have to scrape off of it. I gave it 2 stars because it does scoop just not cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised at the all the positive reviews
customer_reviews.text: I hate this scoop. It is definitely not non-stick. The litter gets all caked on and is difficult (and gross) to remove. I've only had it a couple weeks and am going back to the DuraScoop. I was pretty happy with the DS but am always looking to find something better so I figured I'd give this one a shot. Maybe it has to do with the brand of litter I use but this scoop was a bust for me. Also, it's terrible at picking up smaller clumps. I know the picture is unpleasant but this is what it looks like after every use, and it doesn't come off easily.
customer_reviews.author: GojiBee

customer_reviews.title: Big waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the awesome reviews I believed this would be a great product. However, it is far from great. I regret spending the money on this product. Even though I followed the seller's instructions, I could not prevent the litter from sticking to the scoop. I had to use an additional scoop to scrape this one clean. Save your money and buy the $3 Target plastic scoop. It works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Addison

customer_reviews.title: Best One So Far
customer_reviews.text: Let me start with this will have some sticking. I think it's the cat litter and the cat urine. (which I use Scoop Away for multi cats). With that said...so far this has been the best one. Hardly any stickage and I can wipe what does stick easily with a napkin. I did spray with Pam before using and will probably spray once a week to help with the stickage since my litter does tend to stay wet in certain areas. (I find Scoop Away to be the best in odor and clumping). I also like how the slits are tighter than most so it does get a lot of smaller clumps in the litter. This is worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: JustJoan1970

customer_reviews.title: We're not sh*ting you...this thing is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Large, sturdy, and not made of cheap material! I have no idea why we waited so long and wasted money previously on plastic poop scoopers when this thing existed! Since the sifting area is so large it takes less time to scoop the litter as well! Some litter and waste does get stuck to it, but nothing major. We bought two...and if ever needed, I'd continue to buy this brand...I however don't ever see us needing to replace either of the ones we have...unless somehow one gets ran over. LoL
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: No Rival
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th purchase. Years ago, when the IPrimio first came out, I bought one. I thought it was a little pricey, but I was tired of "crumbles" after scooping. It worked so well, I bought another, then another. 3 cats, 3 boxes. I just purchased the upgraded version. It doesn't work better, but it's heavier duty. I needed that with 4 cats. There are NO crumbles, and clean litter sifts right through. It's held its claim to fame with every litter brand I've used. If you haven't guessed, I love this scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Shari's Peculiar FascinationTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Holy Litter Clean Up Batman! What a Great Scooper!
customer_reviews.text: Far exceeded my expectations. SUCH an improvement over the flimsy plastic one we've been using. Quickly picks up significantly more doo doo and pee clumps thanks to the rigid design and large scoop. The included plastic hangar is a great addition. Easily adhered it to the side of our litter trash can. We were often misplacing our old scoop or would set it on top of the trash can, which was getting litter dust all over the top. No longer an issue with this new scoop and hangar. Quality product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B. Constans

customer_reviews.title: Easy scooping
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these $6-7 plastic scoops for years. They work, they break, but they work! Amazon reviews convinced me to try this. Most importantly, it goes through clumping litter smoothly and with little effort. I probably clean the litter in half the time. Makes a big difference when u are bending down and reaching out to scoop. It also feels very sturdy. Yay metal, less throw away plastic. I doubt it will, but if it breaks I'll recycle it and buy another.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Theiss

customer_reviews.title: Because We Must Scoop
customer_reviews.text: I would spend 15 minutes sifting the litter box trying to get all those stupid tiny clumps out, only to quit in frustration. Now using this scooper, I actually get the satisfaction of actually achieving cleanliness. (It's a cat toilet, so, that's never going to be true.) I use Precious Cat litter, which has pretty fine granules. Larger litter probably won't work so well with this scooper. It doesn't actually "fit" in the Litter Genie's scoop holder, but it is acceptable if you don't want to use the provided hanger.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Too heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I run a cat rescue (Taming Gracie Corp) and we scoop many boxes multiple times a day. I thought this would be better since it would last longer...read the reviews saying how awesome it is. Y'all must have gorilla hands. It's okay scooping (not the best, but okay), but when I try to flip it into the bag to dump the scooped stuff, I end up with balls of urine and feces on the floor because it's just so darned heavy, you have no control. I'll stick with my $1.39 plastic giant scoop at , thank you very much. Just ordered 3 in case I break one or it wears out in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: One of the best, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a terrific product -- a high quality litter scooper. The metallic composition is stronger and sheds litter better than my previous plastic ones, and I expect it will clean and wear better too. But this scooper is noticeable heavy compared to plastic, and I expect some won't like the extra weight. I have three large cats and have previously used a longer handled, heavy duty plastic scooper, but I still notice the weight of the front which makes it more difficult to maneuver in a large litter box. If this scooper is ever redesigned, I hope there is consideration to adding an inch to the length of the handle which may help.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Julia

customer_reviews.title: Decent scooper, strong handle, nice size, but litter does stick to it, it's not non-stick.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent scooper, but it's not exactly as described. Wet litter does stick to it, maybe not as much as other scoopers, but it does stick. The handle is strong, and there is no bending when you pick up a large clump. The holder that comes with it is, in my opinion, quite useless. I wouldn't want to hang a used scooper on the outside of the pan and certainly not on my wall. I put the scooper into a small trash can I keep near the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Abbott

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I found a wider plastic scoop 10+ years ago and thought that was awesome. I have a huge siamese and another cat so I use a big Rubbermaid container as my kittybox. It takes a LOT of sand. For years I've hated scooping because a couple of the support tines broke on my plastic scoop and I have to tentatively dig through the sand... I googled extra large scoop and saw this metal big scoop beast. I immediately ordered it. It's ridiculously sturdy, love how heavy duty it is. The tines are perfectly spaced and it moves through my large and deep sand box with ease. I never imagined I'd be so excited scooping cat litter lol. GREAT CAT SCOOP!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moose2u

customer_reviews.title: Life changing....seriously!!!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's because I'm over 40, have 6 cats, and am well on my way to being a crazy cat lady...but seriously, this litter scoop is amazing!! I wish I would have found it/bought it sooner! It makes litter box cleaning SO MUCH EASIER and FASTER and I don't dread cleaning the litter boxes nearly as much as I used to. Plus it came with a little self-adhesive hanger thing for the wall and boom...life changing. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scoop. Read for suggested add-on
customer_reviews.text: This scoop does everything a litter scoop should do and does it supremely well. For one of the least-fun tasks of domestic life, having the right tools is so important. I happen to use a flushable litter, and to aid in transporting to the toilet without pieces falling on the floor, I've recently bought this dustpan that works beautifully in partnership with the scoop. The handle even nestles in the groove where the brush would be. And of course, the brush is handy for cleanup around the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I am so thrilled over a litter scoop
customer_reviews.text: It's a kitty litter scoop. But believe me it is going to amaze you. This could easily be used as a home defense weapon; It's hefty and ergonomic. I scoop litter like a champ now where as before the plastic scoop would bend and flex with every little mini scoop of litter I dumped into the trash threatening to end its life any second. This one, I swear, I scoop in less time because one quick swoop and i've nearly covered the entire pan of bits. I am quite shocked to say but I love this scoop. Toss your old crappy plastic one and grab this sturdy metal king of all kings kitty litter scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Ranya

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this a LONG time ago!
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this as a gag Xmas gift for my daughter (from the cats, of course). It turns out the joke was on me! This scooper is outstanding and is better than any plastic scooper I’ve ever used. It feels sturdy in the hand and doesn’t flinch when you need to get a heavy clump of litter off the bottom of the pan. The wall hanger is a nice touch as it keeps the scooper out of the way and ready to go. I know it’s only a litter scooper but I can’t say enough good things about it. I wish I would have known about it much earlier but I’m glad I have it now.
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: After 25 years of "scooping" this is the worst one I have every used
customer_reviews.text: After 25 years of "scooping" this is the worst one I have every used. The litter just sticks to it and it makes a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great scoop, but defects to rubber grip
customer_reviews.text: Great litter scoop, glides through litter effortlessly and gets even the smallest clump. Only issue I had was when the scoop arrived, the rubber gripping on the very end of the handle was worn away. I could see the metal underneath! My husband said to just keep it since we needed one, the price was right, and it is solid aluminum underneath the grip. But I don’t love getting brand new items that look used to be honest. Other than that, awesome scoop. It makes cleaning the boxes less of a chore. *Edited to add: I have used this scoop for several weeks and sadly, it is not non-stick.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T.

customer_reviews.title: BEST cat litter scooper
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one in 5 years. The first one I purchased from this brand was made out of plastic. Although it was plastic, it was still very sturdy and i LOVED it. The scooper doesn't waste good clean litter and scoops very well. I like the size of the scooper and that it is ergonomic. I just broke my first one(the plastic version) because I leaned in to the scooper while it was on the floor and it snapped. I did not hesitate to purchase the same brand again and will do over and over as long as I have cats. This version, is even better than the first one that they had.
customer_reviews.author: Jfm

customer_reviews.title: Finally I'm in charge!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd only used plastic scoops before purchasing this on a lightening deal. I always replaced them after 6 months or so because they're so porous,and because I was tired of always having to carefully calculate pressure applied with angle used to remove the largest possible clump without breaking it or even worse, having said broken pebbles fly everywhere. This scooper is large and sturdy. I've only had it a few weeks, but I don't anticipate needing a new one ever.
customer_reviews.author: shereadsalot

customer_reviews.title: Like flipping pancakes
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best kitty litter scoop I've ever used. Our very large cat and only urinates in a certain corner of the box and it turns to cement. I've had to use a screw driver to chip it out. This scoop popped the cement block like it was nothing. Easy as flipping a pancake. It scrapes the bottom of the litter box and picks up even the tiny chunks that usually fall through. It's so efficient. This scoop will make cleaning easier and more thoroughly so the litter doesn't need to be replaced as quickly. Vet clinics and animal shelters should spring for these scoops, they'll save so much time cleaning the litter boxes.
customer_reviews.author: B & A

customer_reviews.title: Decent Scoop; Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad; It's just not what it's made out to be. It's no more "non-stick" than any plastic scoop I've ever used. It's a bit short handled for my tastes, putting me closer to the poop. The sift width could be a little tighter as you do get some droppings back through. Had it been advertised as just a plain old litter scoop, it might be four stars. It is advertised to make it sound like some life-changing-super-scooper. However, it IS just a plain old littler scoop with a handle shorter than I would like. Not a terrible one though. The wall hanger is a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Teflon finish wore off the scoop edge in 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: The scoop shovel works well, sturdy, good grip and does the job well. If the litter is clumped, it doesn't stick to the scoop. The only problem is the teflon coating wears off the bottom edge of the shovel in 2 to 3 days. Makes sense as your plunge the shovel into 4 inches of sand like clay. I use Arm and Hammer brand. I returned the first one thinking the coating was defective. The replacement lasted 2 days. I am keeping it as the aluminum will not rust and should last a long time. I can't believe the manufacture didn't realize this would be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dromedary

customer_reviews.title: Grabs litter easily - even the stuck on stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Scooper. Ever! Very happy with this purchase! This metal scooper picks up litter clumps easily and also grabs anything stuck to the sides of the litter box without any problems. It is larger than a regular plastic scooper, which is a plus - it picks up more clumps in one scoop and there's less chance of getting litter 'sprinkles' on your hands The scooper fits perfectly into the Litter Locker's side pocket, too. I foresee the iPrimio scooper last beyond the life of our cats - it is THAT sturdy! We are a multi-cat household and have in the past gone through several (plastic) scoopers yearly. Just ordered another iPrimio scooper, so we have one per litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Tante May

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Sifter
customer_reviews.text: I have been using plastic litter sifters for years now and have not been pleased. They are flimsy, break, and the litter sticks to them. Digging into the bottom of the litter box was always a pain as I had to do it carefully to keep the darn things from snapping! I don't have that problem any more!!! This sifter stands up to my cat's pee clumps like a champ. And the litter hardly sticks to it, pretty much like they claim. I haven't used the hanger because I don't like the idea of it resting on my walls. But it sure does the job it was intended for.
customer_reviews.author: Jaina Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it depends on what type of litter you use, I don’t know, but I can say litter sticks like crazy to this scooper. I was using the metal scooper with the green handle but it was too big and scratching the litter pans so I got this one. The size is good, fits my small litter bags and easy to hold but any wet litter sticks and then it will gunk up when dry litter touches it. I’ve washed this scooper more than any other scooper I have ever had. The only good thing I can say about it is it will pick up the small chunks that usually fall through.
customer_reviews.author: monicasg

customer_reviews.title: Great for deep scooping those corners
customer_reviews.text: This scooper is light years beyond those plastic small grocery store scoopers. It is metal, and stands up to deep scooping, especially in the litter box corners. It is coated with a teflon type material, so the material slides right off when needed, and does not leave litter clinging to it. It is easy to hold, and seems rather "balanced" in your hand.. This scooper is an excellent value for the money, as you'll never have to buy another one. It will not rust or corrode, and helps you keep the odor under control, as you won't hate scooping!
customer_reviews.author: E. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Now into my 2nd year with this scooper
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe that I would actually feel the need to write a review for a litter box scooper, but here I am. This is absolutely the most durable, best designed and easiest to use litter box scooper I have ever used. And since I have 8 of the fur balls, that very important as I am scooping litter boxes daily and want whatever makes the task easy & quick, THIS DOES BOTH!. This scooper has lasted me almost 2 years now and I am just now beginning to see some loss of the rubber material on the handle. I will be replacing this another IPRIMIO Cat Litter Scooper without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: W. Mills

customer_reviews.title: The best cat litter scoop!
customer_reviews.text: Having just snapped another flimsy plastic scoop, leaving me with a heavy duty plastic scoop that was encrusted with concrete-like litter that was impossible to clean, I turned to Amazon in search of a better scoop. All the positive reviews for this unit caught my eye, so I thought I’d give it a try. What can I say...it’s amazing! The used litter slides cleanly off the scoop each time. The ergonomic handle is very comfortable and although the scoop is metal, it’s fairly lightweight. Cleaning the cat box is not my favorite chore, but this scoop makes the task much easier.
customer_reviews.author: DebNoCo

customer_reviews.title: Best pooper scooper out there
customer_reviews.text: This pet litter scoop is the cat's pajamas. It is by far the best one I have owned - and I've been through quite a few. It is designed so that litter quickly slips through the slits. The handle is nice and long, and it is as sturdy as all get-out! If it has any negative, I found it heavier than I would have wished. But maybe it needs to be in order to be so sturdy and get the job done so perfectly. Until I see another one from this company that is an IPRIMIO and perhaps a bit lighter, I'm sticking with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Fatherslove

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Litter Scoop EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this scoop after having many failures with cheaper, plastic models. We have also tried other large, cumbersome metal litter scoops but were very disappointed with them. This one is everything that it claims to be. It is easy to use, feels good in your hand, makes quick work of getting the job done and it really helps to scrape the bottom of the box when things get messy! It is "non-stick" but only to a degree, but not to worry, this thing is a beast and will help you get the job done quick! We have lots of rescue cats and lots of cat boxes. This scoop has helped to make our work very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Noreen's Kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so scooping cat litter isn't rocket science. I have two litterboxes and keep a scoop with each one. One scoop I've used for years, and it's a cheapo plastic scoop. The other one is too, but it's a lot smaller and, frankly, a piece of crap. After getting sick and tired of it clogging for the thousandth time, I decided to buy a new one. My search brought me here. And I have to say, it takes me less time to scoop with this nice new scoop, it doesn't get clogged, and I can get to the bottom of the box with ease. I've since ordered a second scoop to replace my other plastic scoop. This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps the last scooper I'll have to buy
customer_reviews.text: After years of replacing plastic scoopers every couple of years, I bought this metal one. I wish I had done it years ago. Not only do I expect years of use out of it, I feel confident using it to scrape litter stuck to the bottom, and to lift even the heaviest loads. ... hmmm, that didn't come out right. Again. As far as this scooper is concerned, it is worth the extra couple of bucks. Don't think about it as "twice as much" as the other scoops, think of it as "just a couple of bucks more". And it really is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Best in Show!!
customer_reviews.text: Allan, My best friend is a Mensa candidate and when he does his due diligence I pay attention! I have had cats most of my life and have used standard litter boxes and automatic boxes. This time around I decided to use a standard box. Well, last week my plastic scoop busted. I went on Amazon I noticed my friend had purchased this scoop for his two cats. With no hesitation I ordered the same scoop. I was looking forward to it's arrival because I have no life! I do not have enough positive adjectives for your product! This scoop is amazing and all litter scoopers NEED to own this! Enough said...Thank you for your product! Matthew(Human) Deckard and Rachel(Kitties)
customer_reviews.author: Jon L.

customer_reviews.title: Great scooper
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best pooper scooper we’ve had in the six years that we’ve been blessed to serve...I mean...live with cats. It is sturdy with skinnier slots, so less little brown clumps (if you understand my meaning) falling back into the litter box. It’s pretty big so can get the larger clumps, and it’s sturdy enough to scrape anything that might get stuck on the bottom of the litter box. Cleaning the tool has been easy too. My cat and I highly recommend the scooper. I can’t comment on the included attachment for hanging the tool because we aren’t using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lann5

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Small Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 2nd scooper I've purchased from this company so I hope it's obvious that I'm still loving it! Why do I love this so much? 5 words: It gets the small stuff. The slits in this scooper are the perfect distance apart, and this helps me to not have to change the litter as often. Also, the material it's made of is durable and non-stick (for the most part), and when it does need to be cleaned....it comes clean easily! When cats have a say, no product will ever be perfect. But this product comes pretty damn close.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best litter scoop ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally...the two issues I have always had with cat-poop scoopers..Solved!!! Thank you! Number one is strength. This is metal and strong. You can process what you need to quickly in huge scoops. Two is size of the holes. Most are too large in spots and let smaller clumps fall through, making for a frustrating chore. This model has a uniform, fine strainer that just is the bomb. Makes it so much easier...wish I would have found ALOT sooner...oh and bonus! There's a holder included, mine just hangs on wall near the box
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMike

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly well made! I've had cats my entire life and I finally figured out the litter box science to the point that I don't dread cleaning it out and literally no one ever smells it! Stainless steel box, arm and hammer slide litter, and this scoop. I've never been so excited about cat poop products. The scoop is so sturdy and it tackles the concrete my cats create that all other plastic scoops have failed at and always left bits behind. I love love love this and cannot recommend enough. The hanger it comes with is a plus too, I attached it inside the fake furniture box. Buy this.
customer_reviews.author: MTaylor

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ @ First Scoop!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package, I thought this scoop wouldn’t perform well because the slots seemed too wide. Glad I compared it to my old, tiny, plastic scoop and decided to give it a go (see what I did there?). The old slots were actually much wider. The IPRIMIO’s large size translates to faster pickup. The metal material also means I can scoop heavy clumps. The slot spacing means nothing gets through that I should be bagging. This scoop does a wonderful job, is sturdy, and has already improved the scooping experience.
customer_reviews.author: LoveHim

customer_reviews.title: Makes yucky job easier
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this product is definitely a expert at litterbox cleaning. All the issues I had with previous scoops are resolved. Very sturdy and well made. Narrow slots allow you to get every bit of waste. Wipes clean with paper towel if necessary- no more dealing with cement like build up. I was so impressed with it I ordered a 2nd for 2nd litterbox and a 3rd for my Mom. We laughed that I sent her a popper scooper as a little surprise - but after trying it she called to tell me how much she loved it! No one likes cleaning the litter box - bless this product for at least eliminating some of the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Bestest pooper scooper ever!
customer_reviews.text: I know this may sound odd but I no longer dread scooping the cat litter with this new scooper. Great size, nice weight and nothing sticks to it. No more odors and having to constantly clean a scooper which then starts to rust. The slats are spaced perfectly and the loose litter slides right through. It has made scooping easier and faster. Fits perfect in my Genie poop disposal scoop cup. I highly recommend this product although I think the amount of good reviews speak for itself. Great quality product which is hard to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: artisangirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when my old kitty litter scoop broke. I'd been using it to remove small bits of used litter that other scoops allowed to fall through their slats. I was afraid I wouldn't be able to find another scoop that worked as well. I ordered the Iprimio scoop because it looked sturdy. I was pleased and surprised to find that this litter scoop actually works much better than my old one and promises to last. The clean litter sifts easily through the Iprimio slats, but small used pieces of littler are caught and can be disposed of.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Litter Scoop!!
customer_reviews.text: This litter scoop is amazing! It is extremely sturdy.. But the best part is the sleek design of the scooper glides effortlessly through any kind of litter. I fill my litter box pretty deep with a good six inches of litter, and I always struggled with sifting so much litter around. This scooper is completely different. It makes sifting the litter box an absolute breeze. It takes away the burden of difficult litter scooping. This scoop will make your litter chore a whole lot easier. I'm very happy with my purchase! Its worth every penny! I highly recommend this scoop to everyone! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Falina Grant

customer_reviews.title: The Only Scooper You’ll Ever Need!  Purrrfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This scooper is the sh*t! I have the jumbo Catit Litter box and it holds a ton of litter. I bought the best long handle plastic scoop I could find, and after a few uses, the handle broke. I thought this might be too short, but it’s just the right size. It also has a way of sifting all the litter away perfectly well leaving just the clumps behind. This is the only scooper you’ll need for the rest of your life. I highly recommend this for cat lovers everywhere. (Also recommend the Catit jumbo litter box.)
customer_reviews.author: Steve Peck

customer_reviews.title: Despite the hype, their is a better scoop out there
customer_reviews.text: I've used the IPRIMIO scoop for over a year and it did not live up to the marketing hype. Of course it's better than a flimsy plastic scoop, but it does not match the performance of a different brand metal scoop I get on Amazon that has a larger shovel area, faster sifting, and sturdier all-metal design. Also, ehe IPRIMIO is not 'non'stick' in actual daily use over time. So despite buying two of the IPRIMIO's and giving them over a year, I have returned to the other brand that is superior and gets the dirty job done more quickly and efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Martin Photography

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: It's a scoop, it does what it's supposed to do. The only thing I can really ding a star for is that the litter I use (World's Best Multi-cat Clumping) doesn't sift through instantly. So, I still have to shake it slightly to get it to sift. But, all and all, worth the investment. I won't need to buy another one. It certainly kicks up less dust than the plastic scoop I was using. I also have no use for the hanger. I'm not going to hype it up a ton. I could see someone who uses clay litter having issues with litter sticking to it. Especially if the waste is still wet. Teflon or not, clay sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: The very best scoop ever
customer_reviews.text: I rarely comment on an item unless it is really something great. This is one of those times. This scoop has perfectly spaced times so that my sand flows through rapidly. I use corn based sand because it has less dust and my woman cat is particular, go figure. This scoop reduces box time in half for me. I get right to the business mater and that’s it. It save me time and frustration. Additionally, what ever the coating is, I like it. No dust sticks. I will buy again and tell my fellow cat care takers.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This changes everything!
customer_reviews.text: This the perfect litter scooper. The spacing is perfect. My old one would leave behind poop and urine clump particles that would force me to change the litter too soon; this scoop gets them all. I use the Petco litter so it's perfect for that size litter granules. It's very sturdy, it looks and feels like it'll last a few years. All it has to do is last 6 months at will have paid for itself. My old plastic one would only last about 3 months and start cracking at all the same stress points. Finally a litter scoop that works and lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Benibiker

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop I've owned in 30 years!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many quality (stainless steel) litter scoops over the years, and inevitably the litter gets irreparably clumped on the scoop and is hard as concrete. Putting it in the dishwasher to clean doesn't even work. This non-stick scoop stays clean when scooping wet litter from the corners of the box. There is literally no litter build up at all. It is a perfect size as well, and the little stick on wall holder is a nice way to store the scoop between uses. A well-thought out design is priceless....even if it is a litter scoop. It eliminates a little irritation from daily life and should never again need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: kady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard plastic scoop which was great but it finally broke, I then purchased 'in store' a different metal kitty litter scoop and it was terrible, the openings were way too big and left too much behind. I then bought a plastic USA made scoop which worked but was not sturdy enough so I knew it wasn't going to last very long. This scoop is a world of difference, the openings are narrow enough to pick up little bits of granular urine, very well made, and the grip is easy on my hand. I liked it so much I ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Friscochase

customer_reviews.title: Just wow!
customer_reviews.text: I started thinking about giving them as gifts to fellow cat owners the first time I used it. I have large cats (which in turn means large boxes) and getting down to the bottom of the ~20 lbs of litter in each box was difficult with my old scoop (which ultimately broke it.) Now I get to the bottom of the pan with ease and I don't have to worry if I missed anything! I managed to get some litter stuck to the nonstick coating but it cleaned up instantly, so that was nice! It's definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Scordias

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this years ago
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have a big cat (sorry Grover... "big boned" cat) and he poops and pees a lot. He also requires a very large litter box. This combo makes for time-consuming scooping with traditional plastic scoops. I wish I had bought this scooper a long time ago. Since it's metal, it digs through the heavy amount of litter, and can scrape off urine clumps that are stuck to the side of the box quite well. Additionally, it sifts super fast, at least twice as fast as any scooper I've owned before. This thing just made my life way easier.
customer_reviews.author: xboxremote

customer_reviews.title: IPRIMIO Cat Litter Scooper with Deep Shovel
customer_reviews.text: I've always used plastic litter shovels to clean the cat's litter box over the years. When I saw this model, I ordered one right away for my home. When you dig deep for a shovel full of cat litter, the plastic shovels warp and distort. Not this one, though! It holds a lot of litter in each scoop and the design of the slits allow the unused litter to quickly sift out and back into the litter box. It is very well designed from metal construction and it really speeds up the job of cleaning the litter box!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph N. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy scoop
customer_reviews.text: I'd purchased one like this a while back and paid a small fortune for it, so I was really happy to find this one here, at a lower price and what, I thought, would be a scoop just as sturdy. And I was right. The padded rubber handle is easy to grip, it is large enough to make wide scoops through litter, and it is strong enough that the handle isn't going to break after a couple of weeks scooping. If you have multiple cats, you know the value of having a strong scoop that can get the job done quickly. This one is a good candidate.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ryker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had cats for 29 years and have gone through a lot of litter box scoops. Picking up clumping cat litter with multiple cats is a lot like handling wet concrete. The cheaper plastic flimsy ones tend to break rather quickly and the heavy duty ones are somewhat bulky with thick plastic tines and create a lot of surface area for the wet litter to stick to. This scoop is sturdy metal, thin strong tines and clean edges that dig into corners easily. Clumping litter is designed to be sticky or it would not clump, the no stick coating seems to help reduce wet litter sticking to the surfaces. This is the best litter scoop have come across.
customer_reviews.author: D Beans

customer_reviews.title: Best scooper I’ve owned for small bits!
customer_reviews.text: We have three cats so it’s endless scooping (we like a tidy litter box!). We use Worlds Best Cat Litter (flushable), so we don’t get those solid rock-hard clumps you get with clay litter. That means, small particles break off and littler gets stinky too soon even with diligent scooping. It’s so hard to find a sturdy scooper that catches all the small bits and pieces, but this one does the job! Never been happier about a cat litter scooper before 😹 It’s heavy duty and sturdy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: JXM

customer_reviews.title: Cat Litter Shovel
customer_reviews.text: Great scoop! If all you have are kittens then you m ight get by with a plastic scooper. Otherwise, the amount of litter you have to move to thoroughly clean a box requires something like this scooper. The plastic ones break unless you take itty bitty amounts at a time and who wants to spend that long bending over a litter box? This IPRIMIO Cat Litter Scooper with Deep Shovel is strong, light, balanced, ergonomically designed AND with a great price. The plastic one lasted for months. I expect this Cat Litter Scooper to last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Hofford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect scooper for large breed cats
customer_reviews.text: I have a large breed cat that make huge clumps (boulders) in his box and of course he likes to make them right on the bottom of the box, so they have a habit of sticking to the bottom and have had a habit of breaking cheap plastic scoopers. This scooper has a nonstick kind of surface that helps keep it cleaner. Debris does still stick some, but it can easily be cleaned off. I am going to have to get another of these to keep with boxes on other floors. This scooper seems like it will handle the biggest kitty boulders!
customer_reviews.author: NoVAKim

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it says!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because we were looking for a scoop with very narrow openings. None we had used before allowed us to sift out the little "tailings" when the cats poop in the boxes. (We have 2 cats and 2 boxes) This thing is amazing! It catches every little lump of anything in the box. Nothing sticks to it as it did to our last scoop. The enclosed hanger keeps it off the floor. Thank you for listening to cat owners and making this product. I highly recommend this product to any cat owner.
customer_reviews.author: ladysings

customer_reviews.title: Not totally non-stick but this is an excellent litter scoop
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this scoop 5 stars if it was as non-stick as touted. Matter doesn’t stick near as much as my old scoop, but still. It does fit nicely in my hand and has a good weight, and it moves easily through the litter with little effort. The scoop is larger than my old one and picks a lot up in a single pass. The openings are narrow enough that even the smallest clumps are picked up, but litter still easily shakes out. I also like the scoop hanger that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lynn Umpleby

customer_reviews.title: Miraculous.
customer_reviews.text: I could not wait to write this review. This product may be the most effectively designed, effective product I have ever bought. It transformed the chore of scooping litter (6 cats) into something that takes half the time and 90% of the work out of it. It slide through inches of litter like through water, has perfectly-spaced slots, and is much lighter than anything else I have used. I cannot recommend it highly enough and will buy 2 more today for 2 friends with cats. This product would be a value at twice the price....to think how many years I have been struggling, needlessly, to complete this task twice every single day.......
customer_reviews.author: A fan

customer_reviews.title: Best scoop ever
customer_reviews.text: Best litter scoop I've found! This sucker cut my scooping time in half. I have 4 cats and twice as many litter boxes but for some reason they like to use a couple more than the others and they all like to pee in the same spot. An hour after cleaning the favorite box it looks like a mountain has sprouted in the right front corner. Let me tell you this scoop gets right to the bottom of pee mountain and lifts it out cleanly. BTW the scoop came out clean but just in case I keep a can of food grade silicon spray on hand to refresh the non stick properties as needed.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: blows away plastic scoops
customer_reviews.text: I won't go as far as to say I enjoy cleaning the litter boxes with this scoop, but it's definitely easier. I've used a plastic scoop for 16 years and finally switched to this to go with the Slide litter from Arm & Hammer. It's not quite as non-stick as I was hoping, but otherwise it's fantastic and I wish I had switched to a metal scoop years ago. It doesn't flex, I don't have to use as much force to plow through the box, and the long handle makes for an easy reach. My walls are super textured so I didn't try to stick the holder to the wall - I just hang the scoop from a hook instead.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you have a litter box to clean
customer_reviews.text: You have to clean the litter box, so might as well make the process as quick and painless as possible. This scoop works better than any other scoop I've ever tried, and considerably better than any plastic scoop I've ever used. It picks up even huge clumps with no problems, and the nonstick coating helps keep the scoop cleaner. It's a large scoop, so it gets the job done quickly and efficiently. Pair this with a quality litter, and you and your cat will both be happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hill

customer_reviews.title: My scooper has a nice little coating of litter permanently (unless i wash in ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike advertised, litter does NOT slide right off. My scooper has a nice little coating of litter permanently (unless i wash in hot soapy water, ew) covering the entire bottom half. What's worse is the handle has become a little loose making me wonder when it's going to snap off. EDIT: the owner saw my review and immediately reached out to me to give advice in solving my issue and refunding due to the loose handle. Allan was very helpful. Great customer service... Added an additional 2 stars for this speedy response!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Santineli

customer_reviews.title: Best. Litter Scooper. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: As I peered down at my crusty overused litter scooper with layers of caked on kitty litter debris, I realized this was no longer working and there HAD to be a more efficient way to dig pee/poo out of the litter box. I went on Amazon and found this non-stick scooper and it has changed my life. It's slick, sleek, efficient, and I don't feel like I'm fighting a losing battle with the litter box. I immediately flung my old scooper in the trash and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: amazonqueen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best scoop I've ever used. It's sturdy and gets all the little bits that other scoops don't. And I love the wall mount. I was worried that it would sit against the wall and get the wall dirty or scratched but it holds the scoop away from the wall. I put it on my tub because the 3M adhesive is super strong and I don't want to damage the wall when we move.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Tom

customer_reviews.title: Really IS "the Perfect Scooper "
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing, if a scooper deserved such a compliment. My old scooper would always cake with clumps and would take awhile to shake the granules through. This one filters so fast, no shaking needed everything that should falls right through and all the clumps stay intact (since i don't have to shake). I would recommend this scooper to anyone I wanted to impress! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly the way so many have already said
customer_reviews.text: Reviewing a litter scoop seemed silly to me until after using this one. It’s my third scoop and will probably be my last. Litter stuck on the first use but not since. Like any non-stick item, it will scratch so I won’t be too rough on it. It’s surprisingly lightweight, but sturdy too and is quite comfortable in my hand. Doesn’t take nearly as much effort to use either. Haven’t found anything negative even though I just paid nearly $13 for a cat litter scoop! Worth every cent, so don’t even think twice about the purchase. It actually helps make an unpleasant task way less challenging! Definitely recommend!! Happy scooping! 🐈 👍🏼 🐱
customer_reviews.author: 💖 Kimber 💖

customer_reviews.title: Life saver! (And poop scooper)
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it takes to be considered a professional, but I have scooped a lot of poop over the years and I truly wish I would of found this scoop earlier! It is firm and never bends at the weight of the enemy. I dont know how many scoops i have broken but this one will be the last scoop I have to buy! Best scoop ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wright

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy scoop for big jobs
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 lb muscle cat that likes to pee mostly in one corner of the litter box so scooping the clumping litter when he's done is like lifting out a chunk of concrete. My old plastic scoop couldn't handle it and snapped in half. This one is very sturdy and feels like it'll last a long time. My only complaint is that if the litter isn't 100% dry, small pieces of it tends to get stuck in between the bars, but not any more than my plastic scoops. I just keep a box of wipes next to the litter supplies to wipe it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Schurman

customer_reviews.title: The best scoop I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This thing is built like a tank and is well balanced. My cats (3 out of the 4) like to dig at the bottom of the litter (clay based) and then do their business which requires scraping the bottom of two litter boxes. This scoop is the answer to my scooping prayers. The 'non-stick' is not going to help keep it clean if you're using clay like me. I never expected it to. I'll never buy another type of scoop again after using this model and would have paid twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chosen One

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed...
customer_reviews.text: I finally got the scooper. I had read the reviews and all of that. It's just a good thing that I ordered it and I should have gotten it along time ago. It's not a weak scooper. The size and the ergonomics of the scooper are just what I needed. I've got arthritis in my hands and the plastic kind of scooper were not very comfortable. The first time I used it, I was very impressed. Cat litter didn't stick to it at all. I loved the fact that the little pieces of litter were not falling back into the box. I recommend that you consider getting one if you are looking for a much better scooper!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ford

customer_reviews.title: Non stick, what?
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I don't know this has so many glowing reviews. It sticks just like any other cat scoop I've had, not sure why I thought this would be any different. It most certainly isn't magical, I have to clean it with a tissue just about every time I scoop liter, so no, not magical at all. I still use it only because I threw my other out and I haven't wanted to purchase another one, but I will be soon.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Litter Scooper
customer_reviews.text: This scooper is perfect for scooping litter. The openings are just right so the poop doesn't fall through. I used to own the same scooper, but in plastic. That one broke after a couple of years. So I bought this one because it is made of aluminum and will not break. Last scooper that I will ever need.
customer_reviews.author: David Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Truly excellent scoop.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a similar plastic scoop for a couple of years with great satisfaction. But it cracked, so I ordered this as a replacement. It is equal to the plastic one in efficient litter sifting, and both are far and away better than the various scoops I had used previously. The metal one is more comfortable in the hand, and overall I think the shape of the new scoop an improvement. And, if you have a place to stick on the holder, easy storage would be a plus as well. In short, I believe this scoop well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: vcmjr

customer_reviews.title: I was a bit hesitant
customer_reviews.text: When I received this is looks like a gardening tool... It's a lot bigger than the scoopers I've used. It barely fits in the opening of the biogradable poop bags I bought but once I started seeing how much it picks up and how it catches the small clumps too... I am sold! It lets me clean in half time and the small clumps was the reason I bought this and it delivers. I have 3 cats, so I clean the litter box twice a day... This helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: A.V.P

customer_reviews.title: Nope...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first, then it seemed to lose its non-stick ability. It's like there is a buildup. Now it's not much better than my old scoop, actually worse, because the small slats are harder to clean. Should have known it was too good to be true. Scoop is sturdy and comfortable to use, so that is not an issue. But, non-stick...NOT.
customer_reviews.author: LibraryLuvr

customer_reviews.title: Bought this and the longer handled one..this one wins hands down or up...
customer_reviews.text: This one has slightly smaller scoop size and narrower slits...than it's longer handled version. They would have a hit with the longer one if it had this ones scoop design. Though small differences it seems to make a huge difference in use with the clumping corn cob litter? So for now this is our favorite but kinda wish it had the longer handle at the same time. I gave the long handled one a four star review for not having this ones scoop attached.
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln County MT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this litter scoop after reading so many positive reviews but here is the truth.... 1. I use quality kitty litter and although this scoop is a good sifter...the residual litter sticks to the scoop. Must be washed off after each litter cleaning due to litter sticking to the teflon. 2. The handle is too short. Difficult holding on to short handle while scooping. 3. The metal self adhesive bracket that holds the scoop does not adhere well to a wall, plastic or wood..had to buy command strips to help adhere bracket. I was personally disappointed with this purchase and will likely resume using the heavy duty plastic scooper.
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Bad design. Slow. Clogs.
customer_reviews.text: I thought from the reviews that this scoop had to be great, but I found it to be terrible. The slots are so narrow that litter sifts through it so slow that it doubles the time it takes me to scoop litter. Also every tiny micro piece of litter clogs it slowing down further. Making it worse the volume of the scoop isn't very large so it takes more scoops. It didn't even remove more clumps than my other scoop with larger holes as any good clumping litter make plenty big clumps. That's my experience anyway. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: As scoops go, I really like this one. Like most people, I've been using the cheap plastic ones for years. I took a chance on this and was not disappointed. It has a good grip, the narrow openings make it so you can scoop out the smaller pieces, it scrapes along the bottom and sides of the litter box more effectively, and the non-stick surface actually makes scooping quicker (maybe it's a friction thing). I almost took a star off is because the holder it came with doesn't have a strong enough adhesive backer to hold it up--it fell in the middle of the first night, startling me and the cats--but that doesn't impact the performance of the scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Counts
customer_reviews.text: After a few years of "catlessness", I seemed to have forgotten just how important a quality litter scooper was. I recently adopted 2 kitties. During my first pet supply shopping spree, I purchased a cheaper plastic scooper. Boy was I reminded real quick just how important a sturdy scooper really is. Let's face it, nobody enjoys cleaning the litter box. But I've learned the hard way that scooper quality makes all the difference. Do yourself a favor & spend a few extra bucks for a good one. It's worth it for an item you'll be using once or twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great scoop!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been scooping litter boxes for a long time, even tried the sifting boxes for a while. This scoop combines all the best qualities of a variety of scoops I’ve tried. It has a big deep scoop, a sturdy handle, and perfectly sized slats for sifting, not too big to let the crumbles through but not too small to get clogged and gummed up, also, the slats are rounded instead of flat which seems to me to provide less surface area for things to get caked on to. We started with one to see what we thought and ended up ordering two more after the first time I used it. I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly and reduces time spent scooping!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 cats and 4 litterboxes and this scoop definitely makes scooping quicker and easier. Occasionally the scoop needs to be cleaned but so do the litterboxes and we always had to wash our plastic scoop then too. I like the sturdiness of the handle as I once was scooping, and I must have been too ambitious with the load of dirty litter in the scoop- and the plastic scoop BROKE! The plastic scoop snapped right at the handle and I was sprayed with cat litter (in my face/hair/clothing/ etc). Hubby had to take over scooping while I showered- Ick!!!
customer_reviews.author: LifeWithRenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great scoop. Nonstick feature basically works (just not when still wet)
customer_reviews.text: This scoop has worked great so far (a couple of weeks). The spacing between the metal bars is great. It catches pieces that other scoops miss, and at the same time it is easier to scoop because the holes are not cut out leaving big pieces of metal in the way like other scoops. Also I find that if I hit a clump of wet litter it does stick to the scoop, but as it dries and I continue to use it the scoop is self cleaning. This is unlike regular metal scoops where once things stick they stay stuck. The leading edge is nice and sharp too, which helps scraping. I will update if anything goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Manzanilla Olives

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had anything but plastic scoops, and small ones at that. They broke, and required several "scoops" to clean the litter box. This product is large and made of metal, plus it is coated with a non-stick surface. Makes cleaning the box a breeze, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: All W.

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Scoop
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would get excited about a new litter scoop for Henry, our cat, but his new scoop has far exceeded my expectations. It is exceptionally designed, very well made, comfortable to hold, and the perfectly designed slots glide through litter like a hot knife through butter. And to top it all off, there'a great wall hanger that attaches to the wall by its' double backed tape or include nail. My old troublesome plastic scoop couldn't get to the recycle bin soon enough! This scoop has me rethinking the value of my Litter Robot up north.
customer_reviews.author: phva

customer_reviews.title: Just the scoop we've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 loveable, but messy little furbabies... this is perfect for our needs. It's veey sturdy, a bit heavier than most scoops and the non-stick claims are no lie. We haven't had nearly as many problems with clumpage sticking to the holes in the scooper. I was also thrilled to find out THE HANDLE ISN'T RUBBER (last scoop was so hard to use, we tossed it and got this one after a few days) and I feel it makes cleaning their litter box less of a pain. Highly recommend to those with puddy tats.
customer_reviews.author: Kiera K

customer_reviews.title: This scooper is the perfect size! Its strong without being heavy and it ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a Big Ragdoll kitty who uses a very large litter box I made from a sterilite container. This scooper is a godsend! It makes scooping that big litter box go so much faster and easier. The plastic ones we used previously would just end up bending and breaking all the time when dealing with scooping a large litter box. This scooper is the perfect size! Its strong without being heavy and it is easy to handle. The teflon coating works well to keep the yucky stuff from sticking to it. Really happy to have come across this scooper as it has made the undesirable chore of scooping the litter box much much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: super duper pooper scooper!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kitty litter scooper....I have a Maine Coon cat (large cat)....this takes care of its large size...well ...discards, also picks up the smallest bits. The only problem is to decide if you want the shovel end up, or down...before you mount on wall, I didn't take this into account and didn't allow room to choose...so it turned out shovel side down. Which I prefer, who wants the pooper scooper side up anyway....I love this sturdy, super duper pooper scooper alot. Nice quality, will last forever...this is the one to choose. Love how the waste slides off the scoop, so its clean ready to hang back up.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper girl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with plastic scoopers anymore!
customer_reviews.text: What didn’t I know about this sooner?? This has been amazing when cleaning out my cat litter. Kitty is very happy as well. (The litter box is cleaner with this scooper). Litter sifts through with ease and everything can be scooped up from the bottom and sides of the litter box leaving no bits behind. The best pet is that it also keeps itself so clean by allowing everything to simply slide off of the scoop. I will never go back to plastic again! Gotta go-time to buy one for my daughter and her cats!
customer_reviews.author: Italianna

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST scooper I have ever ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST scooper I have ever ever used....I have been scooping cat boxes for over 60 years. I got this last month...and it has made cleaning my cat box SOOOOOOOO much easier...and I know it will last forever. When they said it was designed by cat owners....I believe it. Completely perfect in my book. As for you dont have to shake? Im not perfect I dont clean my box every single day. I use it with Arm and hammer clump and seal. The second day cleaning I shake just a little...but everyday cleaning never!. THanks for inventing this scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as expected
customer_reviews.text: This scooper is just OK. With all the reviews giving it 5 stars, I guess I expected more from it. It says it is anti-stick, but I found this is not the case with mine. And, for no longer than I’ve had it, I noticed today that the metal has broken into on the edge. It’s only been used on plastic litter boxes and cleaned with antibacterial wipes. I do like the handle as it is longer than most litter scoops. And I do like the grip it provides. Just disappointed that it broke so soon.
customer_reviews.author: JB shopper

customer_reviews.title: WHY DID I WAIT SO LONG TO BUY THIS METAL SCOOP???
customer_reviews.text: IPRIMIO metal scoop is the best litter scoop I've purchased and used. It does collect some cat feces, which should be expected with any scoop, but nothing like the plastic ones do. I soaked it in boiling, soapy water for about an hour and used a wire brush to clean, and it came right off. No hard scrubbing. I will NEVER buy another plastic scoop. I do wish it was lighter in weight, but, lighter may compromise quality, so I really have no complaints. If, like me, you've not wanted to pay the price for a metal scoop, just get over it and buy one! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great overall but not "Non Stick"
customer_reviews.text: This Scoop is pretty good. The metal is nice. The size is good, and the gaps in the bottom are small enough to filter out more small bits, but let my scoopable litter filter through. But it's certainly not non stick. The picture is from the first time I used it. I'm using Arm & Hammer multi-cat. And it sticks just as much as the cheap plastic one this replaced. The company sent an email with some tips, one of which is to use Pam spray, or Wesson oil. I used another spray that I had and it didn't help. And another oil, which didn't seem to help either. So it's a solid scoop, but just not non stick.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Worlds best litter scooper
customer_reviews.text: I read the 5 star reviews before I purchased and I cannot agree more that this is by far the best litter scooper you will ever use in your life! Where was this fantastic product 20 years ago? No more fighting with cat doo doo stuck to the bottom of the box or all over the scooper. Helps keep the litter box much cleaner during scooping as you don't have clumps breaking up and getting all over everywhere. I'm actually thinking about ordering a couple more for gifts for my cat lover friends because I was so impressed with the scoop.
customer_reviews.author: GG and KS

customer_reviews.title: Much better scoop, especially for multiple cat litter pans.
customer_reviews.text: This is like having a really solid shovel to play in the sand . It makes the chore of scooping out the litter pan a little less disgusting and a little more like playing in an admittedly pretty gross sandbox. I have had cats in my life for nearly 45 years at this point and have always used the plastic scoops which constantly seem to be on the verge of breaking or just clogging up so much that I have to clean them with the hose. So while I am not thrilled with the daily chore of cleaning out the litter pan, this makes it easier and less disgusting. (I particularly recommend this if you have multiple cats.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy this sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait this long to get a legit scoop? After snapping a grocery store plastic one I decided I wanted something that would last and purchased this. I never thought scooping litter could have a ‘luxurious’ experience, but after trying this out the first time I wanted to smack myself for using junk scoops for years. No joke: using this was so noticeably better I just bought 4 more for family who have cats for Christmas! I’d highly recommend, this looks great and is built like a freaking tank. Makes it so much easier and faster to scoop out the corners that get gunked up and doesn’t flex when getting out big clumps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: IPRIMIO Cat Litter Scooper with Deep Shovel - Non Stick Plated Aluminum Scoop - Designed by Cat Owners - Patented Sifter with Holder - Super Solid Handle - Black
product_meta.description:
REGISTERED BRAND ON AMAZON: A Cat Litter Scooper (Patented) designed by Cat Owners and Lovers just like yourself. We listened! A little more expensive, but worth it since you use it every day. This is BLACK NON STICK - you can Search on Amazon for Silver Color and less expensive Plastic Version. 


 * You want a Solid Metal Sifter that won't break.
 * You wanted a Deep Shovel.
 * You wanted EZ to clean -- we Non Stick Coated it.
 * You wanted a Solid Handle that won't bend or break.
 * You wanted a place to Hang Your Scooper.
 * You didn't want it too big because you want to get into the corners...our tapered front edge helps this too.
 * You only wanted clean litter to go through the sifter".....Our Perfect Sifter Spacing only allows clean litter to pass through -- other brands are too wide.

Includes a FREE Scooper Holder that you can stick to the wall, or side of the litter box. A "clean way" to store your scooper. Sticky 3M backing allows you to hang your scoop on the litter box, or wall.

Developed and Sold by iPrimio a Michigan Based Company that makes the Amazon 5 Star CatLITTER Trapper Mat too.

BRAND STORY
By iPrimio

Our non-stick coated cat litter scoop with deep shovel lets you clean through narrower space and deep corners by having wider front edge As it is curated by Cat owners like yourself

Ergonomically designed sifter comes with holder – perfect size for getting into the corners and taking larger scoops conveniently saves your time spending with your litter box. Handling The Poop with an Ergo grip handle which makes the sifter getting into the corners and take large scoops

Durability and strength better than plastic scooper – Our non-stick plated scooper is made up of solid cast aluminium with wider front edge design to clean deep corners. Ergonomic grip handle ensures a minimal shaking that allows more clean litter to pass through. Super solid handle.

Coated with same material AAs non stick pans – makes cleaning that much faster. We all understand that some cat feces may stick to the scooper, but we did our best to improve this tough situation. For even better non stick results, spray with cooking oil spray (E. G. , Pam spray). our highest RATED scooper comes with a Holder to hang the scooper after use. Make the right choice by over 2000 positive reviews to make your litter scooper choice right by having iPrimio cat litter scooper

** Important ** non stick coating only helps with sticky problems and for easier clean up. This is our best effort to help you in your daily chores.
